post.text: As secretary of state, Hillary restored our reputation around the world and made us safer.

comment.author: Cameron
comment.text: The news about Putin and his interference in a U.S. presidential election -- via his close ties to Donald Trump -- have been ignored in the media. While sheer innuendo and wishful thinking of Republicans regarding Weiner's emails have now made the top of 4 news cycles. Not to mention the new lawsuit against Trump in Brazil - the news of which just broke this past weekend and YOU heard NOTHING about it here. It was all about Hillary's emails instead. But there is a big lawsuit against Trump just filed this past week in Rio. I want our U.S. media to publish a comprehensive list of ALL the REAL lawsuits pending against Trump - not just in the U.S. but in all other countries in which he is being sued. I want to know the basic court charges. I want to know who brought the cases and why. Why is it that the Republicans manipulate the media to keep anything negative about Hillary -- even when it is just wishful thinking and innuendo on their part - no real charges.... no REAL lawsuits, yet her opponent Donald Trump gets by scott free - with no limelight on his many, many lawsuits. The American voters DESERVE to know ALL the lawsuits that are pending against him -- not just in the U.S. but all over the world. Somebody please give us that information and spend at LEAST 4 to 6 news cycles on it.

replies.author: Cameron
replies.text: Morgan - What the H*** is that? If you just want to talk gibberish - get off my thread.

replies.author: Slade
replies.text: Hey my brothers and sisters get out there and vote and do what Americans do thank you very much The question is will you vote for Donald J Trump or Hillary Clinton in 2016 either way take care of yourself and have a great American day We have the choice to elect Hillary or a psychotic, egomaniac, racist who will trample the constitution and our democracy. Please please vote everyone! #ImWithHer #Hillary2016 If Hillary becomes president the only people she will help is herself, her family, and her donors. It's time to take back our country. #Trump16 come on everybody let's have a little fun vote for Hillary Clinton in 2016 and Donald J Trump 2016 yeah you can vote for both of them sounds like fun don't it?

replies.author: Chelsie
replies.text: The Secretary of State Hillary Clinton played full on PAY TO PLAY with her less than $200K annual salary position amassing a Personal Fortune in excess of $300,000,000 through a Tax Scam known as the Clinton Foundation. She bartered our Country's Uranium and more to create this vast fortune with Government Connections. In the process she hid numerous emails resulting in Criminal Investigations with the FBI.
